Designer

Despite it having been part of my job title for over ten years, design is not something that comes easily for me. Coding I can do with my eyes closed, headphones on, for hours on end; but design—good design—takes time … and a lot of effort.

Good design starts with understanding the problem you are trying to solve. There are various tools available to help here: traffic analysis (Google Analytics et al) can reveal the broad picture, patterns and trends; usability testing reveals misconceptions and bugs, even with a surprisingly small group; and personas can help even the most empathic designer step into their users’ shoes.

I use them all.
